phrases: You need to be there for Mikasa, too!
He is tossing Titans like a madman!
It is you who screwed up my entire plan, you damn commander!
More importantly, find Eren and retreat!
What are the odds of this?!
I am about to avenge your mother and butcher the shit out of this!
Does he not care if Eren is eaten?!
Do not get in our way, you big sack of shit!
What am I supposed to do?
If I cannot count on Reiner, should I cooperate with the Scouts and try to survive?
Even if I can somehow live through all this...
Now's my only chance to hand Historia over to their side!
I will not be able to protect her alone, no matter how hard I try.
Why was it you were trying to take me away?
You said it was to save yourself, but was that a lie?
You are the one who said it, so listen to yourself!
From now on, let us live for nobody but ourselves!
When I am with you, no matter how screwed up it gets...
I have got to be the one to do it!
Who said I was done with you?!
We are trying to get you out of here!
It is time to settle the score!
You have not changed one bit, dammit!
You are still as useless as you ever were!
I still... cannot do anything at all.
You have always... been at my side.
You showed me... how to live with purpose.
You wrapped this scarf around me.
I will wrap that around you...
as many times as you want.
Do Not Know what is going on, but now's our chance!
So that is how it is...
That is why Reiner was so desperate for Eren.
Which means, even inside the walls...
Why did the Coordinate have to fall into
the hands of the worst person imaginable?
We have got to get it back...
I can say... without a doubt...
I cannot protect Bertholdt like this!
Do not let this chance escape!
In that moment, I could not understand the motivation behind Ymir's actions...
Information Available for Public Disclosure Unyielding Vow
Through extensive research and accounts of various incidents, it has become clear that the scourge of Titans which have long plagued humanity are of human origin.

The Colossal Titan which destroyed the wall at Shiganshina District is a human possessing the ability to transform into a Titan, demonstrated by its intent to breach the wall with the purpose to exterminate humans.
Titans are not sent by the heavens to punish us for our sins, but invaders that must be driven back.
Thus, we swear, by the blood our brothers and comrades have spilled waging war against this foe, we shall not relent our lands nor yield the fight.
Why did you come to us?
It is because I am an idiot.
I will be your souvenir to take back home.
You cannot just go back empty-handed.
If you had not come to bust up this wall...
Because I am probably the only one that understands the situation you are in.
It was not so bad, you know... being a goddess for a while.
With reports declaring the possibility that Wall Rose has been breached,
the citizens of Wall Rose were forced to take
refuge in an underground city within Wall Sina.
However, with more than half the
population surviving off food stockpiled for emergency,
rations would last at most for a week.
Any longer than that, and people would turn on each other,
To stop this from happening, within one week from the initial outset,
authorities declared that Wall Rose was secure.
I am glad we came while you are here, Commander Pyxis.
The village the recent Titan invasion originated from?
Actually, I confirmed with him the findings of our investigation on the village.
This only brings further credibility to that hypothesis.
And because of that, the Scouts lost more than half their veteran soldiers.
Still, there were no casualties on our way back.
The Titans completely ignored us and ran off to chase Reiner and the others.
About that, Jean and I sat down to try and figure it out.
We have an idea what made the Titans act that way.
Of course, that is just our theory.
But without assuming that, there is just no explaining what happened.
It is a tough spot to be in, Eren.
Whether or not all those people died for nothing...
If you are worth the price they paid, you better show it.
We do not have time to waste.
I have got to do this.
I will plug up Wall Maria.
I will capture Reiner and make him pay.
That is what I have got to do to atone for all those lives lost.
The Titans responsible for this incident... were the citizens of Ragako?
In other words, the true identity of Titans...
We do not... have proof yet.
I said we do not have proof yet.
We will run out of people before we learn the truth.
It is not worth the cost.
But it is a step towards the truth.
One day, we will break it down.
